Description:
Sold Before Advertising
With views of Greater Geelong, Corio Bay and the You Yangs this beautiful refurbished home offers the luxurious lifestyle you deserve.
The two spacious living areas feature high ceilings, an indoor fireplace and a magnificent barn style door, all adding to the character of the home. A convenient study is tucked into the back of the main lounge area.
The sun-washed north-facing master bedroom features a walk in robe and ensuite, floor to ceiling windows and door to your very own private balcony.
The refurbished kitchen will delight enthusiastic of cooks with stainless steel appliances, gas cooking, a walk in pantry and to the side, a dining area fit for a family. Outside a perfect entertainment space all year round featuring an open fire, vertical garden and grass space for the kids or pets to enjoy.
Plenty of parking is provided with a double garage with internal access and a double carport
Insights: 11 Donvale Drive, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
A light filled, renovated and ready to go!
This lovely renovated 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom brick home with on approx 570m2 has everything you would need and more. Elevated on Cresta Street in Leopold it provides a comfortable light filled home, ideal for entertaining and easy living. The layout has the master bedroom with ensuite and double walk in robe at the front of the home. Opposite the master bedroom is the sunken lounge which features polished floating floors and plantation shutters and a wood fire. Down the hall is the attractive galley kitchen with walk in pantry 900ml gas cooktop, 600ml electric oven, dishwasher and plenty of cupboard and bench space. The dining/2nd living space is located next to the kitchen and beyond this the 2nd bedroom. The remaining 2 bedrooms, laundry and central bathroom are located down the rear hallway. The kitchen looks out to the northern aspect with alfresco and leafy low maintenance garden and workshop. In addition to the wood fire there is gas underfloor heating and cooling for all year round climate control and comfort. Conveniently located it is close to schools, and only moments from Leopold's Gateway Plaza. So if you're looking for a family home with nothing to do but move in you'll love this one. With the stakes in Leopold rising and rising this it's a great place to enter the property market for both owner occupiers and investors alike. Rental estimate at $400pw. Be quick to inspect because this one won't last!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Neat as a pin and ready to go!
This impressive 3-bedroom, 2 bath, 1 living zone plus study home has everything you would need and more. Comprising floating timber floors through all the traffic area the home has a neat entry with study space/ 2nd lounge to the left. Beyond this is the large main bedroom with ensuite with oversized shower recess and large walk in robe. Further into the home has internal access to the 2-car garage and generous laundry on the right. Beyond this the hall opens to the kitchen dining and lounge space. This is really the hub of the home and features a deluxe kitchen with 40ml stone bench and 900ml gas cooktop and walk in pantry which houses the fridge. Separated by another hallway are the remaining bedrooms with Built in Robes and central bathroom with bath and shower. The north facing alfresco is accessed via the living room through sliding doors and features pull down blinds for added protection and comfort even during the cooler months! At the rear is a lawn area and low maintenance garden along the back fence. This really is a lovely package and an ideal first home, downsizer or investment with an estimated return of $400/week. With the stakes in Leopold rising and rising you'll need to be quick to secure this one!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Belmont Gem
This sprawling Belmont beauty is the embodiment of all thats great about this riverside suburb. From the huge 836sqm block to its convenient proximity to the High Street shopping strip and local schools. Not to mention that it is located less than 10minutes from the Geelong CBD, buyers will fall in love with all this property has to offer.
The four-bedroom home has been meticulously cared for over the years. Its somewhat of a blank canvas for those looking for something to make their own with a few cosmetic updates but its perfectly livable as is.
Offering a large open-plan zone, along with a second living area with a fireplace and a formal dining room, providing an abundance of space for entertaining. The well-equipped kitchen offers plenty of storage, a walk-in pantry, and an island bench overlooking the rest of the open-plan zone. Doors nearby open to a large paved courtyard and deck making indoor-outdoor entertaining a breeze.
The main bedroom at the front of the home includes a walk-in wardrobe and en suite, while the further three bedrooms each have built-ins and utilize the central bathroom.
Outside, provide a large double garage with space for a workshop and a triple carport, ideal for those who need to park their caravan or boat at home. The surrounding gardens, lush lawn and established trees create a lovely backdrop both inside and out.
This home is bursting with potential and an abundance of opportunity whether it be for a perfectly located family home, savvy investment, those looking for a renovation project, or even the possibility of a subdivision- GRZ2 (STCA).
The Barwon River is walking distance, while the Surf Coasts beaches are just a 15-minute drive from here. Deakin University, the Epworth Hospital and Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre are also a short drive away from this appealing home.

Description:
Attention builders and developers
A huge opportunity has presented itself in the ever popular suburb of Highton with this much loved family home situated on a large allotment of approximately 669sqm of land. This is an opportunity for a first home buyer, renovator, builder or developer looking for a generous block for redevelopment in an outstanding location. The home comprises three large bedrooms, two living zones, plenty of outdoor space for the family to enjoy and is in need of work for the owner occupier. The opportunities that could be explored is a two townhouse development (STCA) or the owner occupier wanting to build the dream home situated close to all amenities. The property offers fantastic access Porter Ave shops, Highton Village and some of the region's best state schools. With loads of potential for future development this is a must see property for the astute investor, first home buyer, builder and developer. Vendor says SELL.
- Large allotment of approximately 669sqm
- Large frontage
- Development opportunity (STCA)
- Potential for updates and value add
- Perfect first home or investment opportunity
- High growth suburb
- Close to all amenities
- Affordability

Description:
Hamptons Inspired Home with Family Focused Living & Seamless Entertaining
ON The Market
Perfectly picturesque with superb interior proportions, this Hamptons inspired home delivers enormous indoor-outdoor family appeal! Fully renovated and showcasing period elegance, modern style and a fabulously functional family floorplan, all complimented by the beautiful presentation in this ideal landscaped setting.
This showstopper reveals stunning open living and dining domains accompanied by a well-equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 900mm gas cooktop and oven, plenty of storage plus a dishwasher. Featuring three bedrooms with built in robes, master with walk in robe and a convenient powder room; the large family bathroom presents floor to ceiling tiling, single basin, shower, and toilet.
Step out to the undercover deck prime for entertaining or simply enjoying a cup of coffee adjoining the manicured back yard with garden shed and a second undercover entertainment zone ready for your next family BBQ.
Lavished with period features, shutters, new floorboards and carpet throughout, freshly painted, solar panels, split system heating and cooling, Coonara wood heater, ceiling fans in main living and dining area plus electric heating all these seamlessly combine to meet the modern lifestyle considerations.
This home is finished off with ample car accommodation! There is off street parking in the long driveway with side access, plus a substantial 6 car garage which can be used for extra entertainment space, car/ boat storage the list goes on.
Set on approximately 675m2 of land, this charming fully featured home also boasts easy access to local shops, Leopold Primary school, walking tracks, parks and bike trails. Public transport only a stone's throw away and moments from some of the best surf coast beaches the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer! This is a property you will truly want to call your own.
Roncon Real Estate Always ON!

Description:
Set to Tick All of Your Boxes
Nestled in a well-established and highly sought-after pocket of Leopold, this brick veneer, family home puts the elements in place for a charming lifestyle! The convenient floorplan has it all; with an exceptionally well planned and organized layout to suit everyday living.
Situated on a corner allotment (605m2 approx.) within close proximity to the expansive Gateway Plaza - placing cafes, eateries, and big brand stores right at your fingertips. Growing families are taken great care of with Leopold Kindergarten and Leopold Primary School at easy reach, public transport is conveniently close by, while easy access to the Leopold Community Hub, Gateway Sanctuary, and local sporting grounds is an added bonus.
Upon entering this immaculate home, you are greeted by a foyer that flows through to the formal lounge room that sets the high standard for the rest of the home. The formal lounge is bathed in natural sunlight and offers a built-in bar, perfect for the entertainer. The formal dining room creates a peaceful spot separated from the spacious open plan living zone which is large in size and offers ample space for the whole family to enjoy. The immaculate timber kitchen comprises stunning stone benchtops, updated appliances including electric cooktop, built-in oven, built-in pantry and breakfast bar. Offering sliding glass doors which open up to the beautiful, undercover alfresco area- with the option to enclose with weather blinds this space is perfect for all-year-round use.
The main bedroom offers a walk-through robe providing ample storage, while the private, updated ensuite is complete with a shower, vanity and toilet. Three additional bedrooms offer built-in robes and utilize the main bathroom and separate toilet. Completing the floorplan inside is a massive laundry with plentiful storage and external access.
As an added bonus, this property has a remote double car garage, as well as, secure side gate access perfect for caravan or boat storage. All this is complemented by immaculately manicured gardens, with numerous fruit trees surrounding, including apple, lemon and nectarine trees.
Extras include a garden shed for extra storage, solar panels, ducted gas heating throughout and water tank.
If youre looking for a beautiful home to raise your family, then this property is the perfect choice. Be sure to put this one on the top of your list!
Insights: 4 Darrambal Crescent, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Address: 43 Golf Links Road Barwon Heads VIC 3227
Description:
Central Barwon Heads Family Home
The Feel:
Centrally located close to the Village Parklands & primary school, & only minutes from the shores of the Barwon River & shopping precinct, this home caters well to family life. Offering spacious living with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms & 2 living rooms, vaulted ceilings & high windows bathe the interiors in light. Distinctive zoned living & meals areas envelope a covered north-facing entertaining area, providing seamless flow from the indoors to a private outdoor suntrap. Extensive decking, secure fencing & a huge garage combine to create a quality home in an unbeatable position.
The Facts:
-Central location in walking distance to school, village shops, river & beach
-Coastal home with private, sunny outdoor living & entertaining spaces
-Welcoming entry hall reveals rich timber veneer flooring, amplifying sense of space
-Brightly lit kitchen with soaring vaulted ceiling opens onto covered north-facing deck
-Main living with Coonara wood heater & direct access to 2nd sunny covered deck
-Reverse cycle air conditioner with heat & cool vents to all bedrooms
-Well-equipped kitchen with stone benches, ample preparation/cupboard space & WIP
-Stainless steel apps: 900mm f/s oven, gas hob, DW
-Well-resolved floor plan maximises space to include 2 living areas, 4 bedrooms & 2 bathrooms
-4 bedrooms, (3 with walk-in robes). while the master bedroom boasts a walk-in robe and en suite
-Master with WIR & en suite, 2 further bedrooms with WIRs, 1 with BIR. All have ceiling fans
-Central family bathroom with shower, spa bath, Tastic heater & separate WC
-Study with built-in desk & skylight
-Ducted gas heating throughout, SSAC & gas log fire in main living, ceiling fans
-Fully fenced back garden for children & pets, raised vegie beds, productive fruit trees
-Oversized DLUG w/ workshop space, double rear roller door for extra vehicle/boat storage
-Rear slab behind garage provides extra practical space with deep eaves
-Exposed aggregate concrete driveway OSP for 2 cars
-10,000ltr water tank plumbed to toilets & garden (new pump)
-Other features: double glazed windows, ducted vacuum, outdoor shower
-Ideal for families, weekenders or a secure investment property
-Great position within walking distance of beach, BH Golf Club & bustling main street
Owner Loves....
We love our neighbourhood! Barwon Heads has such a friendly vibe and we love walking to the shops, parklands or river on a daily basis. We spend a lot of time on the alfresco deck as it is such a protected spot, and we love the Moonahs, gums and native gardens in our private front yard.

Description:
Sought after elegance in leafy locale.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Cam Foster on 0406 597 050.
Renovated throughout and immaculately presented, this charming brick veneer masterpiece offers a rare opportunity to secure a unique home complemented by an enviable standard of living. The intelligent layout features three bedrooms with BIR's, master including its own beautifully renovated ensuite, decked out with floor to ceiling herringbone tiles and double vanity. Updated main bathroom and separate toilet services the entire property, allowing for flexible contemporary living.
As you enter the home you will step into the spacious light filled kitchen, living and dining area, you are immediately welcomed by the gorgeous timber flooring, flowing throughout. The fully renovated kitchen features stone bench tops, induction cooktop, dishwasher, glass splashback and ample storage space. Features include single lock up garage with ample off-street parking in the U-shaped driveway, ducted heating and refrigerated cooling throughout. Leading seamlessly out onto the front entertaining area, soaking up all the North facing sun, lies the perfect deck for hosting family and friends all year round. Families will appreciate close access to a selection of schools, within walking distance to Highton Village and just a short drive to the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre.
Ideal for first home buyers or investors looking to secure a quality turn-key property in a very sought after pocket of Highton.

Description:
Mid-Century Marvel on 700sqm
So much of Highton's most tightly held real estate is hidden away amongst leafy green surrounds yet central to all of the action and this magnificent mid-century residence is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship and quality of lifestyle.
Constructed in the early 60's on the low-side of the street with all the original tastes of the era, the property offers multiple living zones, well sized accommodation and a warm flowing ambience throughout that you'll simply fall head over heels for. The north-facing frontage drives in that desirable sunshine to the bedrooms and living zones and truly sets the tone.
The potential for renovation, extension, rebuild/development are all fantastic options given the size of your allotment and orientation although it would be a shame to see the character of this home leave the streetscape.
Back to location, make no mistake that this is as good as it gets for the growing family. Walking distance to multiple bus stops, Montpellier Primary School and the North Valley Road shops and Highton Village within easy reach.
This is a truly exceptional opportunity to acquire a chip off the best block in this charming Highton pocket - don't hold back, contact today to book your private inspection!
Insights: 5 Lambhill Crescent, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Magnificent Outlook in Supreme Location
An exciting opportunity presents itself with possibly one of the most conveniently positioned and highly sort after blocks in Highton.
With land size of approx. 755sqm it is perfectly suited to build a stunning dream home with plenty of room for a pool or oversized backyard.
The block commands views across the Barrabool Hills yet only minutes to the bustling Highton Village shops, Barwon River, cafes and Barrabool Hills Shopping. Within easy access to the Ring Road for the commute to Melbourne in under 1 hour & just 15 minutes to the ever-popular Surfcoast Beaches and just minutes to the education hub that is Deakin University and the Epworth Hospital.
A block of this size location with views has become a rare commodity in Highton & this is your opportunity to secure your future.
Insights: 7 Stoneleigh Cres, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Stylish, Contemporary Home in Elevated Location!
PLEASE CONTACT ADAM NATONEWSKI FOR A PRIVATE VIEWING
Seldom do you find such a pristine example of modern, low maintenance living than 25 Springdale Rise. Recently built by Dennis Family Homes and in excellent condition throughout, here is a property that oozes both simplicity and sophistication in the ever popular Highview Estate. Featuring three internal living zones, four spacious bedrooms - all including their own walk in robes, an inviting outdoor deck and spectacular rural views from the western side, the property offers the complete package to young families or even downsizers who want that bit extra for when guests come over.
On entry to the left is the first living area which could either be used as a rumpus or a generous study/home office. Walk further to discover the open plan living, dining and kitchen area, all taking advantage of windows of light on the northern side. The kitchen features a 40mm caesarstone bench tops, walk in pantry and a stylish pendant and spotlight settings. Upstairs the master bedroom at the front features an oversized walk in robe adjacent to the ensuite. The remaining bedrooms all surround the 3rd living area great for kids to watch their own movie. Outside the deck area is perfect for summer entertaining with a large built in seating and raised bench area. Glorious sunset views await on the rural plains to the west. Ducted heating channels throughout and ceiling fans in all bedrooms take care of temperature needs.
Nearby Barrabool Hills Plaza is home to popular fast food options, Anytime Fitness 24/7 Gymnasium, Woolworths Supermarket, BWS, Bakery, Medical facilities & Chemist. Ring Road access is also not far away providing smooth commuting to Melbourne & the Surf Coast.
Insights: 108 other 4 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Well-presented, solid home in leafy Jan Juc!
Youll love:
The leafy outlook from this solid brick home, located less than a 5-minute stroll to the Bob Pettit Reserve, kids playground and Jan Juc Creek Nature Reserve.
Sitting by the fire in the spacious front living room thats separate from the main kitchen / meals / lounge area.
A wonderful undercover courtyard for entertaining guests with built-in seating & steps that lead up to a grassy, north facing yard.
Other features including the lush new carpets, excellent natural light, freshly painted interiors all in a quiet street with no through traffic.
Plus:
A generous allotment and tranquil setting surrounded by native plants and established fruit trees.
The open plan kitchen / meals / lounge area with tiled flooring and split system heating & cooling connects to the central courtyard.
Master bedroom has an ensuite, generous WIR & a ceiling fan while bedrooms 2 & 3 both have BIRs.
Enjoy loads of off-street parking including a double carport, plenty of internal storage & much more in the extremely well-presented Jan Juc home.
Insights: 15 Windarra Grove, Jan Juc VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Jan Juc have recently been sold.

Description:
Tidy home in a peaceful pocket.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.
Situated in a private and peaceful pocket of ever-popular Leopold, this neat and tidy 3-bedroom home is perfect for those searching for a first home, investment or downsizer.
On entry, the hallway leads to the light-filled and open plan kitchen, living and dining area which opens out to a spacious backyard and side courtyard.
The kitchen features a gas cooktop, electric oven, dishwasher, and plentiful cupboard space. Accommodation is comprised of 3 spacious bedrooms with built-in robes, the main bedroom with walk-in robe, a clever 2-way bathroom offers a separate toilet and adjoins the main bedroom and hallway. Outside, the concreted entertaining area is great for summer entertaining and could be further enhanced by the addition of a pergola. (STCA) The large and secure backyard is ideal for those with pets or young children.
Notable features include:
- Split system air conditioning
- Gas wall heater
- Ceiling fans in all bedrooms and living area
- Freshly painted walls and ceilings throughout
- Single garage with front and rear roller door
Located just down the road from the Estuary Reserve, just 3 minutes' drive to the Gateway Plaza, as well as being about 20 minutes' drive from Geelong and the Surf Coast, there is a lot to like about this package!
Insights: 10 Barney Grove, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
First Home Buyer grant available - request a private inspection!
This well designed four bedroom home is fit with a wonderful open plan living, dining & kitchen. This welcoming home balances modern style & everyday practicality with natural light filled spaces and proximity to your everyday needs. This single level design is perfect for your first home ($20k grant available) or first investment (currently tenanted for $1,695 per calendar month on a periodic lease).
Kitchen- spacious benchtops with overhang for breakfast bench, stainless steel appliances including gas cooktop, oven, rangehood & dishwasher, double sink, built in pantry, neutral colour tiled splash back including a side wall tile splash back also
Living- open plan, adjoining living, dining & kitchen creating a spacious area, well-lit naturally, tiled flooring throughout kitchen & dining, main living carpeted for comfort, block out roller blinds, ducted heating throughout with reverse cycle split system air con in main living, glass sliding doors opening from dining to outdoor alfresco
Master bedroom- block out roller blinds, carpeted, ducted heating, walk in robe, ensuite with vanity, top to toe tiled shower & personal toilet
Additional three bedrooms- carpeted, ducted heating, sliding built in robes, block out roller blinds, well-lit naturally
Main bathroom- tiled bath & shower, vanity & separate toilet for privacy
Outdoor- low maintenance gardens, established backyard, outdoor cement alfresco for entertaining, fully fenced
Mod cons- ducted heating & roller blinds throughout entire home, carpeted main living inclusive of all four bedrooms, tiled kitchen & dining, laundry with linen press & external access, double lock up garage with internal & backyard access
Ideal for: investors (currently tenanted for $1,695 per calendar month), couples, young families and first home buyers ($20k grant available)
Close by local facilities: Marshall train station (walking distance) allowing easy access to Melbourne, Grovedale College, Primary School & Kindergarten, Grovedale IGA supermarket
*All information offered by Armstrong Real Estate is provided in good faith. It is derived from sources believed to be accurate and current as at the date of publication and as such Armstrong Real Estate simply pass this information on. Use of such material is at your sole risk. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information that is passed on. Armstrong Real Estate will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information. PHOTO ID MUST BE SHOWN TO ATTEND ALL INSPECTIONS *
